    ABOUT

    My name is Ulises Andrade, I am 25 years old and originally from Mexico. I have a bachelor's degree in industrial engineering but I have always had a love for programming since I was in high school. I have created this portfolio as my first web development project, since I am currently pursuing a diploma at Cornerstone International Community College, and as my skills improve I will modify this portfolio.

    PROJECTS

    The curricular experience I have is more focused on the area of ​​process engineering, which is not related to the area of ​​web development. I currently have no experience in web development projects, only in school work. Here I show some images of school projects that I have interacted with.
